company_updates.reshared_post_description:
In this episode, we sit down with Maher Loubieh, Co-Founder, CEO, and Board Member of HALA. Hala is one of the leading fintech players in the MENAP region. 

Maher walks us through Halaâ€™s bold pivot from a B2C product, which led to the loss of over 200,000 users, to rebuilding the company from the ground up and now serving more than 130,000 SMEs.

We talk about what it really takes to start over, the lessons behind that pivot, and what Hala is building today: a full-stack financial platform designed to help small businesses start, run, and grow. Equipping them with with tools like digital wallets, smart POS systems, business accounts, and data-driven lending.

Founded in 2017 and licensed by the Saudi Central Bank, Halaâ€™s vision is to become the future bank of SMEs in the region.

Available on: 
-YouTube: https://lnkd.in/dNHuwJtK
-Apple Podcast: https://lnkd.in/dVN3Ta_m
-Spotify: https://lnkd.in/dRkUAWsm

In this episode, we sit down with Maher Loubieh, Co-Founder, CEO, and Board Member of HALA. Hala is one of the leading fintech players in the MENAP region. 

Maher walks us through Halaâ€™s bold pivot from a B2C product, which led to the loss of over 200,000 users, to rebuilding the company from the ground up and now serving more than 130,000 SMEs.

We talk about what it really takes to start over, the lessons behind that pivot, and what Hala is building today: a full-stack financial platform designed to help small businesses start, run, and grow. Equipping them with with tools like digital wallets, smart POS systems, business accounts, and data-driven lending.

Founded in 2017 and licensed by the Saudi Central Bank, Halaâ€™s vision is to become the future bank of SMEs in the region.
